FORM_VALIDATION_MESSAGES.MUST_NOT_CONTAIN_MORE_THAN_CHARACTERS: Must not contain more than {{maxLength}} characters
FORM_VALIDATION_MESSAGES.SHOULD_NOT_START_WITH_EMPTY_SPACE: Should not start with empty space
FORM_VALIDATION_MESSAGES.SHOULD_NOT_CONTAIN_ANY_SPECIAL_CHARACTER: Should not contain any special characters
FORM_VALIDATION_MESSAGES.SHOULD_NOT_END_WITH_TRAILING_SPACES: Should not end with trailing spaces
FORM_VALIDATION_MESSAGES.SHOULD_BE_BETWEEN_VALUES: Should be a value between {{min}} and {{max}}
